response.overview: During an ever-growing epidemic of zombies that have risen from the dead, two Philadelphia SWAT team members, a traffic reporter, and his television-executive girlfriend seek refuge in a secluded shopping mall.
response.tagline: When there’s no more room in HELL, the dead will walk the EARTH!
response.title: Dawn of the Dead
